option.name: preConfigureCommands
option.value: #!/bin/sh # # GNU Autotools template, feel free to customize. # export TARGET=aarch64-linux-android export libplist_CFLAGS="-I/Volumes/Development/Android/other/libplist/include" export libplist_LIBS="-L/Volumes/Development/Android/other/libplist/build/src/.libs -lplist-2.0" export limd_glue_CFLAGS="-I/Volumes/Development/Android/other/libimobiledevice-glue/include" export limd_glue_LIBS="-L/Volumes/Development/Android/other/libimobiledevice-glue/build/src/.libs -limobiledevice-glue-1.0" which autoreconf >/dev/null && autoreconf --install --force --verbose "${PROJECT_DIR:-..}" 2>&1; /bin/sh "${PROJECT_DIR:-..}/configure" --host=$TARGET
